text: Me and Mr. Ray is the second full-length album by Miracle Legion, and the last recorded on the Rough Trade Records label, released in 1989. ==Release== Released on vinyl, CD, and cassette, the 10 song LP Me and Mr. Ray was released under Rough Trade Records in 1989. The songs were composed by Mark Mulcahy and Ray Neal. ==Track listing== All songs written by Mark Mulcahy and Ray Neal ==Personnel== *Mark Mulcahy - vocals *Ray Neal - guitar ==References== Category:1989 albums Category:Miracle Legion albums Category:Rough Trade Records albums
title: Me and Mr. Ray
